title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 93.1 - Convictions exempted from the requirement of certification of conviction to the commissioner
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 93.1 - Convictions exempted from the requirement of certification of conviction to the commissioner

State Regulations
(a) Subdivision 6 of section
514
of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law provides that the commissioner may exempt the
courts from certifying certain convictions for specific violations of the

Vehicle and Traffic Law or of local laws, ordinances, rules or regulations in
relation to traffic to the commissioner. (b) The following convictions shall not be
certified to the commissioner: (1)

Any
conviction involving the operation, registration or equipment of a snowmobile
or a motorboat. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
93.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
